audio_sermons.title: The God Who Judges Kings And Nations Today
audio_sermons.description: Brother Dan Biser gives a solemn word on a prayer conference call about the current state of America and the Church. He clearly shows every sin and action is before a holy God who has to judge wickedness in our society. May this message build a solemn fear of the Lord in our day that we may confess our sins and seek the mercy of God through Jesus Christ.
